name: VR Bike Racing 3D for Cardboard Virtual Reality Viewer Glasses
name_original: VR Bike Racing 3D for Cardboard Virtual Reality Viewer Glasses
description:
Press the Cardboard Trigger or look "START" button to start the game! Look left or right arrows to change bike.

Tilt your head in the direction that you want to move the bike.

Press the Cardboard Trigger or look brake button for the brake.

You have to go as fast as you can while following the given course and win the race!

This game is for VR Cardboard glasses and other 3D mobile virtual reality headsets.

Suitable for children and all ages.

Have fun !
